title: A proclamation for the careful custody and well ordering of the new river brought from Chadwell and Amwell to the north parts of the city of London James R.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
publisher: Printed by Cha[rle]s Bill, Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At head of title: By the King.
At end of text: [Giv]en at our court at Whitehall the fifth day of March 1685/6.
